ygData.subject: Re: Unfair?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, I get that often when fighting hand to hand and casting :) The problem I see with getting attacked on the boat on the trip to Erudin is that it s supposed
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, I get that often when fighting hand to hand and casting :)
The problem I see with getting attacked on the boat on the trip to Erudin
is that it's supposed to be safe, but you're still attacked, and by
underwater creatures while on deck, of all things.
I mean, getting killed by a shark while standing on the deck should not be
possible. This makes the whole trip from Queynos to Erudin a pain.

On Tue, 27 Apr 1999, McCartney, Michael R wrote:
> From: "McCartney, Michael R" <michael.r.mccartney2@...>
> As your skill in whatever spell you cast improves.. you'll get better
> at that. It happens to me all the time, while gating..
